column4: anyone know to apply Different wallpapers for each workspace in ubuntu 9.10
are you running   gnome or kde and ar e you using compiz?
ok   understand that with compiz  and different wallpapers  you cannot have desktop icons and desktop right click will be disabled
if that is ok I can wall you t hrough  multiple wallpapers]
ok   open ccsm  go to the Utility category and enable the wallpaper plugin
then click on the wallpaper plugin to get into it's settings and you will see the "Backgrounds" field
choose the wallpapers you want to use and then click the "New" button to inset them into the wallpaper plugin...the first one will be one viewport #1  etc
put those wallpapers into the wallapper plugin and let me know when you are finished with that
ok open a terminal        gconf-editor
maneuver  to   /apps/nautilus/preferences
in the right pane  look for     show_desktop   and disable that  and your wallpapers should show up immediately
working now?
cool :)
also
there is a script to install  about 20 new plugins in compiz  some experimental all work well
would you like to intstall the extra plugins for compiz?
also when in irc and you want to have the person you are talking to highlighted for them   type the first few letters of their nick  and hit the tab button to complet it  then type your message
thanks
no problem :)
if at some point you want to try the extra plugins let me know or meet me in  #compiz   channel :)
did that work
did what work?  the nick thingy ?  yes
the only thing is remembering to use the person's nick to get their attention:)  otheriwise it is just a bunch of text streaming by fast  lol
